biography.bio: Ivan Mistrík was born on October 15, 1935 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Roméo, Juliette et les ténèbres (1960), Higher Principle (1960) and Orlie pierko (1972). He died on June 8, 1982 in Bratislava.
biography.name: Ivan Mistrík

biography.bio: Ivan Rajniak was born on July 10, 1931 in Hybe, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for The Copper Tower (1970), Daleko je do neba (1974) and Orlie pierko (1972). He died on February 23, 1999.
biography.name: Ivan Rajniak

biography.bio: Andrea Cunderlíková was born on May 6, 1952 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Five Girls Around the Neck (1967), Little Summer Blues (1968) and Racha, chemi sikvaruli (1977).
biography.name: Andrea Cunderlíková

biography.bio: Vlado Müller was born on March 19, 1936 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for The Medal (1980), Obzalovany (1964) and Master Executioner (1966). He died on June 20, 1996 in Slovakia.
biography.name: Vlado Müller

biography.bio: Július Vasek was born on December 29, 1926 in Nové Zámky, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for And Give My Love to the Swallows (1972), Tam za lesem (1962) and Brothers (1962). He died on May 1, 2009 in Bratislava, Slovakia.
biography.name: Július Vasek

biography.bio: Slavo Drozd was born on March 21, 1931 in Vrútky, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for The Copper Tower (1970), Orlie pierko (1972) and Akcia Edelstein (1986). He died on July 13, 2008 in Bratislava, Slovakia.
biography.name: Slavo Drozd

biography.placeOfBirth: Kralova Lehota by Liptovský Mikulás, Austria-Hungary [now Slovakia]
biography.bio: Ondrej Jariabek was born on February 20, 1908 in Kralova Lehota by Liptovský Mikulás, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor and writer, known for V piatok trinásteho (1954), Zemianska cest (1958) and The Sad Princess (1968). He died on February 3, 1987 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Ondrej Jariabek

biography.bio: Adam Matejka was born on November 21, 1905 in Paludza, austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for The Shop on Main Street (1965), Statocný zlodej (1958) and Sváko Ragan (1976). He was married to Alzbeta Matejkova. He died on April 21, 1988 in Liptovský Mikulás, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Adam Matejka

biography.bio: Rudolf Bachlet was born on December 8, 1895 in Svosov, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for At the Eleventh Hour (1959), Pán a hvezdár (1960) and Orlie pierko (1972). He died on November 27, 1974 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Rudolf Bachlet

biography.bio: Jozef Kuchár was born on September 15, 1928 in Ceklis, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for The Sad Princess (1968), Stastie príde v nedelu (1959) and Dialogue (1968). He died on January 23, 2009 in Bratislava, Slovakia.
biography.name: Jozef Kuchár

biography.placeOfBirth: Tisovec, Rimavská Sobota District, Czechoslovakia [now Slovakia]
biography.bio: Stefan Misovic was born on December 19, 1921 in Tisovec, Rimavská Sobota District, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Stastie príde v nedelu (1959), Rysavá jalovica (1970) and Encounter with the Shadows (1983). He died on April 30, 2008 in Martin, Slovakia.
biography.name: Stefan Misovic
